article_title: Rx for reform: NC pharmacists try to boost health and cut costs
article_text: North Carolina’s community pharmacists are taking a lead role in a $15 million Affordable Care Act experiment to see if they can cut costs and keep patients healthier.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Pharmacies, Affordable Care Act, health care reform, medical home, Center for Medicare and Medicaid Innovation, CMMI, Community Care of North Carolina
